citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:55pm on 02-
APRIL-2024. The inspector called the phone number on file and left a voicemail requesting a callback and rang facility
doorbell. No contact was made and the inspector left after waiting for 30 minutes. Failure to provide access to the facility,
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in
enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:55pm on 02-
APRIL-2024. The inspector called the phone number on file and left a voicemail requesting a callback and rang facility 
doorbell. No contact was made and the inspector left after waiting for 30 minutes. Failure to provide access to the facility, 
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in 
enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
